Recommended Podcasts

A collection of my favorite IT and cybersecurity podcasts. These have been invaluable in my learning journey, helping me understand complex topics and stay current with industry trends.

Critical Thinking

A podcast focused on the technical details of bug bounty.

Visit Website
Darknet Diaries

True stories from the dark side of the Internet.

Visit Website
Behind the Binary

Exploring technology and Reverse Engineering.

Paul's Security Weekly

Weekly discussion on the latest security news and tools.

Visit Website
David Bombal

Networking, cybersecurity, and IT career advice.

Visit Website
Insecure Agents

A podcast about security, privacy, and technology.

Visit Website
Security Noise

Cutting through the noise in cybersecurity with TrustedSec.

Visit Website
LINUX Unplugged

The Linux Action Show for the community, by the community.

Visit Website
What the Hack?

A podcast exploring hacking and cybersecurity topics.

Visit Website
Across the Pondcast

UK-based cybersecurity podcast covering news and trends.

Visit Website
Blue Security

Defensive security strategies and blue team tactics.

Visit Website
Hacker Valley Studio

Stories from the cybersecurity community.

Visit Website
The Hacker's Cache

A podcast about hacking, security, and technology.

Visit Website
Bug Bounty Reports Explained

Breaking down real bug bounty reports and vulnerabilities.

Visit Website
Cyber Work

Career advice and insights for cybersecurity professionals.

Visit Website
Hacked

Stories of hacking incidents and security breaches.

Visit Website
OffSec Podcast

Offensive Security's podcast covering penetration testing and security. This podcast has not produced any new episodes in a few years, but I found that the content is still applicable.

Visit Website
Self-Hosted

A podcast about self-hosting, privacy, and taking control of your data. This podcast has stopped producing episodes, but I have always found it had great content and it was one of the things that inspired me to create my own homelab.

Visit Website
Simply Offensive

Offensive security topics made simple.

Visit Website
The Homelab Show

Everything about building and maintaining your homelab. This podcast has also stopped producing new episodes, but much like the Self-Hosted Podcast this show help to inspire my homelab journey.

Visit Website
Unsupervised Learning

Security, technology, and artificial intelligence.

Visit Website
